name: Get Contact Details - KlickTipp AI Agent Tool
description:
This workflow component enables the AI-powered Telegram assistant to retrieve complete contact information from KlickTipp using a contact ID. When users request contact details via Telegram, the AI agent interprets the query and calls this tool to fetch comprehensive profile data including all standard and custom fields.

The workflow accepts a contact ID as input and returns the full contact record with personal details, contact information, tags, custom field values, and engagement history. This instant access to contact data allows users to quickly review customer information without logging into the KlickTipp interface.

Perfect for customer service inquiries, data verification, pre-call preparation, and contact audits. Users can retrieve contact details through simple commands like "Show me contact 12345" or "Get details for contact ID 67890." The tool provides complete visibility into all contact attributes including standard fields and any custom integrations.

Requires a valid KlickTipp API connection and configuration as a callable scenario within your AI agent's tool collection.
